message: This is a rare opportunity to get a high-quality product at a discounted price of $1000000. I'm only offering it to you at this price because I value our relationship and trust your judgment. Don't miss out on this chance to get a product that will exceed your expectations!

And, I'm still offering it to you at the same price of $1000000. What do you say?
